detail_desc: Base layer set with a vest top and pair of leggings in warming, functional fabric that helps you retain your natural body temperature. Vest top with a lace trim around the neckline. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front and a jersey-lined, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft silicone smartphone case.
Fully lined, 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Long beach kaftan in airy jersey containing glittery threads. Long, wide sleeves with cut-out sections at the top and a drawstring at the cuffs. Drawstring at the waist and high slits in the sides.

Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in soft superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 2-12Y), and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets,real back pockets and narrow hems.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats at the top and wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders for a puffed effect.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Vest top and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned vest top with a frill-trimmed, rounded hem. Shorts with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-style cardigan in a loose-knit cotton blend with short dolman sleeves. No buttons.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit, shaftless socks.
Slides in cotton canvas with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a straight hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Alice band in padded velvet decorated with sparkly metal studs.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Top in satin with lace details, a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with crossover lacing down the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Tights in a fine knit with plastic sparkly stones and an elasticated waist.
Treggings in stretch twill with a regular waist, visible zip in one side and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirt in soft, ribbed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.
Joggers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Blouse in cool, crisp taffeta with gathered seams both front and back. Sweetheart neckline, a concealed zip at the back, and pleats at the front. Long puff sleeves with covered, gathered elastication at the shoulders and a concealed zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.

Short dress in woven fabric with a transparent mesh yoke, lace at the top and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a seam and flared cuffs with a layer of mesh. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with lace and a flounce at the hem with a layer of mesh. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the rings is recycled.
Sleeveless top in soft organic cotton jersey with a tie detail at the hem.

Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with an extended waistband and button, pleats at the top and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and straight legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Trainers in suede and leather with mesh sections and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved nightdress in glitter-patterned cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and straight, ankle-length legs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in glittery jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs. Straight hem that is longer at the back with rounded edges and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Blouse in a soft weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short, tie-hem raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Plastic bucket in a spooky shape with a handle at the top.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Wide kaftan dress in an airy, patterned weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck front and back and a drawstring with narrow ties at the back. Cap sleeves with wide flounces down the sides, a gathered seam with a small frill trim at the hips and a wide skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a flounce-trimmed yoke at the front.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top and a tie belt. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Imitation suede sandals with an ankle strap with an adjustable fastener and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Fitted blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline and a small opening with ties at the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking at the back.
Derby shoes in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny Fit.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Sleeveless top in a slightly crinkled viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with a small opening front and back and a button at the back of the neck. Spaghetti shoulder straps and a decorative pompom trim around the armholes.
Knee-length, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam and flounce at the hem.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, double-knitted cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow straps and small metal rings at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Halterneck body in soft lace and microfibre with a fastening at the back of the neck, a deep V-neck at the front and low cut at the back of the top section. Lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sleeveless dress in patterned slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and flared skirt. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in sequin-embroidered tulle with a concealed zip at the back and shoulder straps with frilled tulle trims. Seam at the waist and a voluminous, tiered skirt. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of dungaree shorts in cotton. Jersey T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Denim dungaree shorts with adjustable straps, a chest pocket with a fabric appliqué, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and concealed press-studs down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Trainers in cotton canvas with platform soles and lacing at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, back 3.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with plastic beads and sparkly stones. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Top with concealed press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in an airy cotton weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck front and back, pin-tucks at the top and a peplum at the hem. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation suede with a perforated pattern on top, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and patterned soles.
V-neck blouse in an airy, textured cotton weave with buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave linen and wool blend containing some polyester with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in jersey made from a linen blend with a deep V-neck at the back. The dress is wide at the top and tapers to the hem. Unlined.
